name: Stage Light Planner
body:
### Welcome to Stage Light Planner!
Stage Light Planner is a simple and easy to use stage planning software.

![Stage Light Planner](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/49088008/slp/sample.png)

### Getting help
If you need help, start by taking a look at the [user manual](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/49088008/slp/manual.pdf). If that doesn't answer your question, you can either contact me directly at [support@nicoco007.com](mailto:support@nicoco007.com), or create a new issue over on the [project's issue tracker](https://github.com/nicoco007/stage-light-planner/issues).

### About Stage Light Planner
Stage Light Planner is maintained by @nicoco007. It started as a Computer Science project to help with audiovisual technician work at school.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
